title: If Your Family Drives You Crazy, These Self-Care, Sanity-Saving Essentials Fit in a Carry-On
author: Dominique Michelle Astorino
description: We love visitng family over the holidays, but sometimes you need a second line of defense against stress.
cleaned_text: We know you can't fit a full-blown diffuser into your suitcase (or maybe you can . . . if so, congrats), so throw this tiny little USB in instead. The [Young Living USB Diffuser](https://www.youngliving.com/en_US/products/usb-diffuser-pink) ($23) can plug into your laptop computer, into a port in your car, or in the guest bedroom.
